SENT.plain: Burkitt' lymphoma is a malignant, non-Hodgkin's lymphoma of high grade that present two clinical from the african or endemic form affects near the middle of children of central africa and the american or sporadic form, that was first described in North American and the clinical setting was similar to endemic form
In our geographic area is an unusual entity
We present a clinical case of marrocan child that the first symptom was nasosinusal
